General.Name: ACELYRIN, INC. Common Stock
General.Description: Acelyrin, Inc., a clinical biopharma company, focuses on identifying, acquiring, and accelerating the development and commercialization of transformative medicines. The company's lead product candidate is lonigutamab, a subcutaneously delivered monoclonal antibody targeting IGF-1R, which has completed Phase 2 clinical trial for the treatment of Thyroid Eye Disease (TED). Acelyrin, Inc. was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Agoura Hills, California.
General.Address: 4149 Liberty Canyon Road, Agoura Hills, CA, United States, 91301
